DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; KUWAIT ; U.S. , KUWAITI TROOPS STAGE MANEUVERS
DOC.TEXT: Kuwaiti and U.S. troops staged joint maneuvers and U.S. jets bombed abandoned Iraqi tanks in the desert , displaying U.S. resolve to protect the emirate on the fourth anniversary of Iraq ' s invasion . About 1 # 500 American soldiers and several hundred Kuwaitis participated in the exercises . The maneuvers were the latest in a series of joint exercises staged under a 10-year defense pact that Kuwait signed with Washington in 1991 .
